question.body: What is the function of the sarcomere?

multiple_choice.choice: connect muscle to bones for stabilization

response.feedback: Incorrect. That is the role of tendons
Correct. The sarcomere is the basic functional unit of muscle
Incorrect. Skeletal muscle does not store calcium in the sarcomere

part.hint: The sarcomere is the basic unit of a muscle cell (fiber).
